summary: Email correspondence between Special Agents regarding new information about a phone call made by Jeffrey Epstein on the night of August 9, 2019, and scheduling a meeting with the warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for the following day. The email clarifies that Epstein was never in general population and was supervised during a legal visit.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Author of the email providing information about Epstein's phone call and supervision, and coordinating a meeting with the warden.

persons.name: Warden
persons.role: Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC)
persons.context: Briefed the OIG SAC on details of Epstein's phone call and is scheduled for a meeting at SDNY.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual who made a 19-minute phone call on August 9, 2019, and had a supervised legal visit that day.

persons.name: Modano
persons.role: Special Agent in Charge (SAC), Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Was briefed by the Warden regarding the details of Epstein's phone call.

connections.description: The Warden briefed SAC Modano on information regarding Epstein's phone call.
Coordinating a meeting at SDNY and discussing information about Epstein's incarceration.
The Warden was responsible for Epstein's custody at MCC and had information about his phone call and supervision.

events.title: Epstein's Phone Call and Legal Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein made a 19-minute phone call at 7:17 PM and had a supervised legal visit lasting from approximately 8:00 AM to almost 7:00 PM.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting with Warden at SDNY
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for 10:00 AM at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) with the warden of MCC.

locations: 1 Battery Park Plaza, 29th floor, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: On August 9, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein made a 19-minute phone call at 7:17 PM, details of which were briefed by the Warden to OIG SAC Modano.
Epstein was never in general population at MCC and therefore did not require an approved call list.
Epstein had a supervised legal visit on August 9, lasting from approximately 8:00 AM to almost 7:00 PM, with constant supervision by BOP staff.
A meeting was scheduled for August 12, 2019, at 10:00 AM at SDNY with the MCC warden to discuss the new information.
